price: Wakasema: Tumepoteza kopo la mfalme. Na ataye lileta atapewa shehena nzima ya ngamia. Nami ni dhaamini wa hayo.
arabic: قَالُواْ نَفۡقِدُ صُوَاعَ ٱلۡمَلِكِ وَلِمَن جَآءَ بِهِۦ حِمۡلُ بَعِيرٖ وَأَنَا۠ بِهِۦ زَعِيمٞ
footnotes: Wale wasaidizi wakajibu: Tunatafuta kikopo, nacho ni chombo anacho nywea mwenyewe mfalme. Na malipo yake kwa mwenye kukileta ni shehena nzima ya chakula anayo ibeba ngamia. Yule mkubwa wao alitilia mkazo hayo kwa kusema: Na mimi ninadhamini kutimiza ahadi hii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū nafqidu ṣuwāʿa al-maliki waliman jāa bihi ḥim'lu baʿīrin wa-anā bihi zaʿīmun
